Hi,
1- I am wondering if there is a way to specify a seeds file for a job i=
nstead of filling out the textarea on the web interface. I have a seeds fil=
e with 100K URLs but I do not know how to provide it as input.

2- Here is =
the scenarion I want to use Heritrix for and I would like to know if my ass=
umptions are correct. I want to gather a data set consisting of webpages th=
at have:
      a- HTML forms
      b-  Javascript processing forms data.
Th=
en I will go offline and iterate over the ARC archive files that result fro=
m my crawl using a java program. While iterating, I can check each one of t=
he files if it is of type html/text and if so check if it contains an html =
form. If it does and the code that processes the form is in a separate java=
script file is there a way to extract that file from the archives using for=
 example its URL as an index or do I have to download that file again?

3- =
Is there a good reference with some example profiles with values for the di=
fferent configurations available along with description of when to use each=
 of these profiles (I mean based on the bandwidth available to my machine a=
nd its processing power I can use these reference examples to better decide=
 different inputs). 

Thanks for your help
